## HttpErrorInterceptorOptions.shouldHandlePredicate property

Predicate that is used for testing whether response should be handled by HttpErrorInterceptor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
shouldHandlePredicate: (response: HttpErrorResponse) => boolean;
```
